caption.p: Characteristics of some metabolic pathway blockers in influenza infection

tr.td: Reconstitution of metabolic status and decreased viral replication
Ameliorates metabolism and intensifies the symptoms
Decreased influenza replication and cytokine production
Suppresses cytokine storm and viral replication
amino acid, fatty acid and arachidonic acid pathway
Improved weight loss, lung index, biomarkers and inflammatory mediators such as prostaglandin E2
Restores the ATP levels in cells and intensifies the symptoms
Sterol regulatory element binding protein (SREBP) pathways
Inhibited influenza virus replication through interference with SREBP paths

table-wrap-foot.p: DADA Diisopropylamine dichloroacetate, MJWQH Modified Jiu Wei Qiang Huo
